de.esoco.ewt.composite

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.HasId<java.lang.String>

    public class Calculator
extends FocusableComposite
    A calculator composite that allows the user to interactively calculate a BigDecimal value.
